subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador of Spain, the 2007 champion whose team was barred from the Tour last year, leads a talented field for the biggest race in cycling.
snippet: Alberto Contador of Spain, the 2007 champion whose team was barred from the Tour last year, leads a talented field for the biggest race in cycling.
